ThingDef.label: Mechanoid Blaster
ThingDef.description: A turret with a mechanoid blaster on top that automatically fires at nearby and distant enemies. Has a chance to explode in an EMP impulse when damaged.\n\nEvolved defense building, primarily made for stationary warfare against xenomorphic insectoids and mechanoid swarms - on planets of importance. Has 4 Blaster Cannons with a long range target acquisition attached to it. The central weapon system is mounted on an auto turret of a sturdy nature. Relies on Mechanoid Technology. Can be upgraded.

ThingDef.label: Mechanoid Blaster
ThingDef.description: Evolved defense building, primarily made for stationary warfare against xenomorphic insectoids and mechanoid swarms - on planets of importance. Has 4 Blaster Cannons with a long range target acquisition attached to it. The central weapon system is mounted on an auto turret of a sturdy nature. Relies on Mechanoid Technology.

ThingDef.label: Mechanoid Detonator
ThingDef.description: A turret with a mechanoid laser gun on top that automatically fires at nearby and distant enemies. Has a chance to explode in an EMP impulse when damaged.\n\nEvolved defense building, primarily made for stationary warfare against heavy ordinance - on planets of importance. Has a Laser Cannon with a long range target acquisition attached to it. The central weapon system is mounted on an auto turret. Relies on Mechanoid Technology. Can be upgraded.

ThingDef.label: Mechanoid Detonator
ThingDef.description: Evolved defense building, primarily made for stationary warfare against heavy ordinance - on planets of importance. Has a Laser Cannon with a long range target acquisition attached to it. The central weapon system is mounted on an auto turret. Relies on Mechanoid Technology.

ThingDef.label: Mechanoid Coil
ThingDef.description: A turret with a shockwave gun on top that automatically fires at nearby and distant enemies. Meant to support during heavy warfare. Has a chance to explode in an EMP impulse when damaged.\n\nEvolved defense building, primarily made to support against incoming ground units. Outsorted models were taken out and misused to beat down riots on Jailplanets. Has a Shockwave Gun with an AI target acquisition attached to it. The central weapon system is mounted on an auto turret. Can be slightly upgraded.

ThingDef.label: Mechanoid Coil
ThingDef.description: Evolved defense building, primarily made to support against incoming ground units. Outsorted models were alienated to beat down riots on Jailplanets. Has a Shockwave Gun with an AI target acquisition attached to it. The central weapon system is mounted on an auto turret.

ThingDef.label: Mechanoid Devastator
ThingDef.description: A turret with a heavy Novagun on top that automatically fires at nearby and distant enemies. Has a chance to explode in an inferno when damaged.\n\nEvolved defense building, primarily made to slow down any incoming offenses with its reactive orbs. The fireline Novagun is guided by an AI Smartfire upgrade and scans the surrounding area for thermal signatures and movement. The central weapon system is mounted on an auto turret. The case can be slightly improved.

ThingDef.label: Mechanoid Devastator
ThingDef.description: Evolved defense building, primarily made to slow down any incoming offenses with its reactive orbs. The fireline Novagun is guided by an AI Smartfire upgrade and scans the surrounding area for thermal signatures and movement. The central weapon system is mounted on an auto turret.

ThingDef.label: Mechanoid Multi Burst
ThingDef.description:
A tank turret with a Quadgun on top that automatically fires at nearby and distant enemies. Has a chance to explode in an inferno when damaged.

Needs Plasteel to repair.

Evolved defense building, primarily made to sieve through approaching combat forces with its superior firepower. Has high velocity fastcharger guns with an adaptive AI target system attached to it. The central weapon system is mounted on an auto turret. Can be upgraded.

ThingDef.label: Mechanoid Multi Burst
ThingDef.description: Evolved defense building, primarily made to sieve through heavy combat forces. Has a Quad Gun with an AI target system attached to it. The central weapon system is mounted on an auto turret.

ThingDef.label: Mechanoid Trinity
ThingDef.description: A turret with a mechanoid trinity gun on top that automatically fires at nearby and distant enemies. Has a chance to explode in an inferno when damaged.\n\nEvolved defense building with an unbelievable firerate and low accuracy, designed to maw down anything entering its security zone. Has a Trinity Gun, which is fed by 4 large ammunition containers with magnum breaker cartridges inside. The central weapon system is mounted on an auto turret. Needs steel to renew the barrels after heave use. Can be upgraded.

ThingDef.label: Mechanoid Trinity
ThingDef.description: Evolved defense building with an unbelievable firerate and low accuracy, designed to maw down anything entering its security zone. Has a Trinity Gun, which is fed by 4 large ammunition containers with magnum breaker cartridges inside. The central weapon system is mounted on an auto turret. Needs steel to renew the barrels after heave use. Can be upgraded.

li.xpath: /Defs/ThingDef[defName="MPC_MechanoidBlasterTurret" or defName="MPC_MechanoidLaserTurret" or defName="MPC_MechanoidDevastatorTurret" or defName="MPC_MechanoidMultiTurret"]

li.upgradedTurretDescription:
A turret with a mechanoid blaster on top that automtically fires at nearby and distant enemies. Has a chance to explode in an EMP impulse when damaged.

Evolved defense building, primarily made for stationary warfare against xenomorphic insectoids and mechanoid swarms - on planets of importance. Has 4 Blaster Cannons with a long range target acquisition attached to it. The central weapon system is mounted on an auto turret of a sturdy nature. Relies on Mechanoid Technology.

Upgraded onto a Liberty plattform for full and unrestricted mobility. Thats close to having legs.

A turret with a mechanoid laser gun on top that automtically fires at nearby and distant enemies. Has a chance to explode in an EMP impulse when damaged.

Evolved defense building, primarily made for stationary warfare against heavy ordinance - on planets of importance. Has a Laser Cannon with a long range target acquisition attached to it. The central weapon system is mounted on an auto turret. Relies on Mechanoid Technology.

Upgraded with an automatic Forecast Gateway System to enhance its channeling power and accuracy vastly. Some crazy guy did that.

A turret with a shockwave gun on top that automtically fires at nearby and distant enemies. Meant to support during heavy warfare. Has a chance to explode in an EMP impulse when damaged.\n\nEvolved defense building, primarily made to support against incoming ground units. Outsorted models were alienated to beat down riots on Jailplanets. Has a Shockwave Gun with an AI target acquisition attached to it. The central weapon system is mounted on an auto turret. Can be slightly upgraded. The generator was improved with a Sonic Boom Enhancer.

A turret with a heavy Novagun on top that automtically fires at nearby and distant enemies. Has a chance to explode in an inferno when damaged.\n\nEvolved defense building, primarily made to slow down any incoming offenses with its reactive orbs. The fireline Novagun is guided by an AI Smartfire upgrade and scans the surrounding area for thermal signatures and movement. The central weapon system is mounted on an auto turret. Offers a Kevlar Fusion stormhood against any kind of high penetration.

A tank turret with a Quadgun on top that automtically fire at nearby and distant enemies. Has a chance to explode in an inferno when damaged.

Needs Plasteel to repair.

Evolved defense building, primarily made to sieve through approaching combat forces with its superior firepower. Has high velocity fastcharger guns with an adaptive AI target system attached to it. The central weapon system is mounted on an auto turret. Enhanced with an extraordinary high density plating and ground stabilizers to withstand an earthquake.

A turret with a mechanoid trinity gun on top that automatically fires at nearby and distant enemies. Has a chance to explode in an inferno when damaged.\n\nEvolved defense building with an unbelievable firerate and low accuracy, designed to maw down anything entering its security zone. Has a Trinity Gun, which is fed by 4 large ammunition containers with magnum breaker cartridges inside. The central weapon system is mounted on an auto turret. Needs steel to renew the barrels after heave use. Can be upgraded. The casing has been reinforced with an Legacy Alloy. Can bath in bullets now.
